post.body: @dooby04
Sure ... but ... uhhhh ... just because the protagonist is named "Wes Geoffel" doesn't mean you can read anything into it.
I'm just sayin', my smutty writing sucks more than HER smutty writing!
I think Chris Crocker is working on it. "How DARE you! Leave Ann Coulter alone! Being a hateful, opprotunistic c*nt is HARD!"
I can haz marteeney?
I am? I do? How did they know? Don't you? Don't we all? What other trouble can I get into? What if I type "nipple electrocution?"
It's painfully obvious that you need to get laid.
Agreed. Just saying there are no excuses. You know how we love to feel important by crucifying our heroes.
Somehow lofty unattainable ideals like "Contract with America" come to mind.
@ambergirly
@indypodcaster Sad thing is, there's some foot fetishist out there who is COMPLETELY turned on by the video. Has it on a loop.
The other big problem with an economy in the shtter is that depressed, laid-off people seem to want to call, visit, and bug me all day.
Never start a sentence with "I'd appreciate it if you would..." (As if your appreciation means ANYTHING to me.)
You know the worst part about recessions? The boredom.
Is it possible that we've got TOO MANY awards now? And why haven't *I* won one of these? http://tinyurl.com/5e5axp
I'm freezing my ass off (1535 Broadway, New York, NY 10017)
Okay, so some days I *do* miss TWO of my brothers.
I'm at Freddy's Backroom (485 Dean St, Brooklyn, NY 11217) - http://www.freddysbackroom.com/
Okay, not even 24 hours and I'm already done with my family. Surely there's a decent soup kitchen I can spend Thanksgiving in.
I'm at Blue Sky Bakery (53 5th Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11217)
Seriously, WTF?! This is why we have neighborhood covenants! http://tinyurl.com/5o4voj
So long Dubya ... it's the end of an error.
Particularly since my bread's not buttered that side up.
I just can't abide that whole passive-aggressive Twitter prostitution thing.
I'm getting really sick of the Blagojevich stuff. At least when a New York Governor goes down, he shows a girl a good time. (Drum fill) Hey!
I'm completely baffled. The Rudy Sarzo fan club is STILL active and recruiting? Like, won't he come play your living room for $50?
